author: gozer
msg: Added Apache::CmdParms::add_config() to work around a memory
leak discovered with <Perl> sections in .htaccess files

author: stas
msg: clarify that it's the package/stash that gets cleared, not just a module

author: gozer
msg: Added ModPerl::Util::unload_package() to remove a loaded package
as thoroughly as possible by clearing it's stash.

author: stas
msg: Apache->request can now be set-able w/o needing PerlOptions +GlobalRequest
